text: Nick Galifianakis (July 22, 1928 - March 27, 2023) was an American attorney and politician. He was the Democratic U.S. Congressman from North Carolina. He served as a representative from 1967 through 1973. Galifianakis was born in Durham, North Carolina. He studied at Duke University, and was an assistant professor at this university. Galifianakis was the uncle of comedian Zach Galifianakis. Galifianakis died at the age of 94 on March 27, 2023. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1928 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Academics from North Carolina Category:People from Durham, North Carolina Category:Lawyers from North Carolina Category:United States representatives from North Carolina Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Nick Galifianakis (politician)
